Class ModuleHub

java.lang.Object
ModuleHub
public class ModuleHub extends Object
ModuleHub is the traffic controller: it routes requests to the proper team module. It acts as the middleman that talks to Accounts, Storage, Reports, Prediction, and Validation teams. Flow: 1) Accept a request 2) Forward to the correct team 3) Gather the response 4) Return the response to the caller

  • Method Details

    • callStorage

      public boolean callStorage(String action, String username, int year)
      Calls the Storage team to load, save, or delete budget data.
      Parameters:
      action - what we want Storage to do
      username - which user's data we're working with
      year - which year's budget data
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise

    • callReports

      public String callReports(String reportType, String username)
      Calls the Reports team to generate a financial report.
      Parameters:
      reportType - "monthly", "annual", etc.
      username - whose report to generate
      Returns:
      formatted report text

    • callPrediction

      public String callPrediction(String scenarioType, String username, int year)
      Calls the Prediction module to run "what-if" scenarios.
      Parameters:
      scenarioType - what to calculate
      username - whose data to use
      year - which year's data to use
      Returns:
      prediction result text

    • callValidation

      public boolean callValidation(String validationType, String dataToValidate)
      Calls the Validation team to check if data is valid.
      Parameters:
      validationType - type of validation to perform
      dataToValidate - actual input data
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise

    • callAccounts

      public boolean callAccounts(String action, String username)
      Calls the Accounts module for user account actions such as login/logout/password.
      Parameters:
      action - "login", "logout", "changePassword", "deleteAccount"
      username - the account username
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise
